content.html: The problem with learning from experts is that they are so far removed from square one. Their material assumes some foundational knowledge. Newbies, don't be afraid to share what you're learning. From the beginning. We - even the experts - need your fresh perspective!
content.value:
The problem with learning from experts is that they are so far removed from square one. Their material assumes some foundational knowledge.

Newbies, don't be afraid to share what you're learning. From the beginning. We - even the experts - need your fresh perspective!
